cms.query.QueryText:
-- InitiatedChatRequestLastModification has to be set to SQL Server time because of synchronization across web farms
INSERT INTO Chat_InitiatedChatRequest ( [InitiatedChatRequestUserID], [InitiatedChatRequestContactID], [InitiatedChatRequestRoomID], [InitiatedChatRequestState], [InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName], [InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorChatUserID], [InitiatedChatRequestLastModification] ) VALUES ( @InitiatedChatRequestUserID , @InitiatedChatRequestContactID , @InitiatedChatRequestRoomID , @InitiatedChatRequestState , @InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorName , @InitiatedChatRequestInitiatorChatUserID , GETDATE() ); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS [InitiatedChatRequestID]
